body_html: Thanks, looking forward to it. We've since done some of that benchmarking on Pascal GPUs and verified that enabling non-fused Winograd wasn't as big a deal here, but it'd be great to see that massive speedup on 3x3 convolutions by default on Kepler. 3x3 convolutions are extremely common, and most cloud vendors are still only providing Kepler hardware.

body: Thanks, looking forward to it. We've since done some of that benchmarking on Pascal GPUs and verified that enabling non-fused Winograd wasn't as big a deal here, but it'd be great to see that massive speedup on 3x3 convolutions by default on Kepler. 3x3 convolutions are extremely common, and most cloud vendors are still only providing Kepler hardware.
